title: Champion Mastery and Blue Essence
body:
Will there be changes to the Hextech Crafting system in the future? 
I find myself getting tokens on my main champs frequently but keys are fairly rare and champion shards are even more rare. 
I always get skin shards for champs I don't main, leaving me with a bunch of Orange Essence and no way to get blue essence unless I spent money and buy a ton of keys. 
Will there be changes to this any time soon? I'm sitting on multiple Level 6 and 7 Mastery tokens, eligible for upgrade, but I never get any blue essence.
